The image in question was circulated on: s army chief Qamar Javed Bajwa, along with Indian political figures Mamta Banerjee, Navjot Singh Sidhu, Rahul Gandhi, and Shatrughan Sinha sitting in a corner.
The image had been shared by an individu: accumulating 4,200 shares, and was accompanied by a caption that implied voting for the Congress party in India would be equivalent to supporting Pakistan.
The image received 3: 000 likes on a Kannada Facebook group called "ಗುಬ್ಬಚ್ಚಿ ಗೂಡಿನಲ್ಲಿ ಮಧುರ ಮನಸುಗಳು" (Sweet Hearts in a Dollhouse).
It was determined that the image was pho: as a Google reverse image search led to the original photo where the Indian leaders were not seated in a corner. The image was later revealed to have been photoshopped by a Twitter user named @Atheist_Krishna, who sarcastically mocked the opposition leaders in a tweet that received over 7,000 retweets.
